job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongRemote within the USstrongnbsp em110k  140kemppbrppstrongAbout PodsightsstrongppPodsights is a small distributed organization seeking an engineer to join our growing team Heres a little about us a little about what we believe and what we are looking forppPodsights is an industryleading attribution platform for podcast advertising We handle over 10 billion events a month and we likely work with some of your favorite brands and publishersppOur mission is simple we are looking to grow the podcast industry Far too many brands try a podcast advertising campaign and churn Or worse they dont even try to enter the market By providing a platform for brands to optimize results we encourage investment in podcast advertising and by proxy to publishersppbrppThe podcasting industry has seen a lot of growth in the past few years and we believe it has more room to grow Beyond growth podcasting presents some interesting problems its decentralized RSSbased nature and the various ways people can listen Joining Podsights is an excellent opportunity to be handson with an evolving mediumppbrppWe believe that where you went to school has little bearing on your performance as a software engineer Where you live isnt a proxy for talent were fully remote and the team lives all over the place one of us even lives in Spain Your current employer provides a low signal about your future potentialppbrppDifferent backgrounds bring different perspectives and we believe this helps us be better problem solvers We encourage applications from all sorts of diverse backgroundsppbrppAt Podsights we look for ambition and curiosity We love engineers that arent solely interested in the craft of developing software Want to start a company of your own one day If yes we want to talk Are you interested in the business side of software Tell us moreppWe want curious engineers You take things apart and see how they work the real test is if you can put them together tooppbrppOur team consists of members of Embedly acquired by Medium Horizon Media Claritas NPM and How Stuff Works You can learn more about us herenbsphttpspodsightscomteamppbrppWeve got benefits toopulliCompetitive compensation and a 401K programliliFully remote role with an annual WFH stipendnbspliliWe cover 100 of health benefits medical dental and visionliliWe offer 4 weeks of PTO each yearliliA generous maternitypaternity leave policynbspliulpbrppstrongAbout the RolestrongppYour role will focus on our Django application with some projects dipping into the data or the front end On a given day you might be creating new data models adding an endpoint to our API or working with our data pipelines The benefit of joining a small team is you will have a tremendous impact on the companys direction and to some extent the industryppbrppRequirementspulli2 years of experience as a backend or data engineerliliProficiency with Python or a similar languageliliFamiliarity with SQL and NoSQL data structuresliliDjango Flask or a similar web frameworkliulpbrppBonuspulliDjango ORMliliGraphQL GrapheneliliCloud infrastructure GCP preferredliliData and ETL platforms Airflow Dataflow and BigQuery preferredliliIf the above interests you drop us a note Were less worried about a resume LinkedIn is fine but more importantly tell us about your ideal next role Unfortunately we are unable to provide sponsorship at this timeliul
